name: Flask App
postCreateCommand: echo '{"python.defaultInterpreterPath": "${workspaceFolder}/backend/venv/bin/python", "python.terminal.activateEnvironment": true}' > .vscode/settings.json && if [ "$CODESPACES" = "true" ]; then python -m venv backend/venv && backend/venv/bin/pip install --upgrade pip && backend/venv/bin/pip install -r backend/requirements.txt; fi
